data.text: “Medaa me ho adi kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔammisa mʼase;
Da mu nyinaa, matrɛw me nsa mu ama
Nnipa a daa no woyi me ahi
wɔn a wɔtenatena nna so
wɔka se, ‘Mumfi ha; mommmɛn me,
“Hwɛ; wɔakyerɛw ato hɔ wɔ mʼanim se,
mo ne mo agyanom bɔne nti,”
Sɛɛ na Awurade se:
Mede Yakob asefo bɛba,
Saron bɛyɛ nguankuw adidibea,
“Na mo a mo de mugyaw Awurade
mede mo bɛto afoa ano,
Enti sɛɛ na Otumfo Awurade se:
Mʼasomfo bɛto nnwom
Wubegyaw din bi a ɛbɛyɛ mmusu
Obiara a ɔsrɛ nhyira wɔ asase no so no,
“Hwɛ! Mɛbɔ
Nanso momma mo ani nnye na munni ahurusi afebɔɔ
Mɛsɛpɛw me ho wɔ Yerusalem mu,
“Ɛrensi bio wɔ mu
Wobesisi afi na wɔatena mu,
Wɔrensisi afi mma afoforo mmɛtena mu bio,
Wɔremmrɛ ngu
Mebua wɔn ansa, mpo, na wɔafrɛ me.
Pataku ne oguamma bedidi abɔ mu
